subject: Water Polo
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Brenda Villa and Heather Petri will lead the United States women’s water polo team and Tony Azevedo and Ryan Bailey will head the men’s squad at the Beijing Olympics. Those four, all three-time Olympians, were on the 13-player teams announced Monday.
snippet: Brenda Villa and Heather Petri will lead the United States women’s water polo team and Tony Azevedo and Ryan Bailey will head the men’s squad at the Beijing Olympics. Those four, all three-time Olympians, were on the 13-player teams...
